location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: IOR/L/PS/10/994/2 consists of memoranda, letters, and correspondence concerning the development of an oil concession for Oman. Topics discussed include:Negotiations with the Anglo-Persian Oil Company (APOC) for an oil concession in Muscat, with three outstanding points in the agreement to be concluded with the Sultan of Muscat and OmanOil concessions in Muscat, Bahrain and Kuwait, and APOC's wishes to be accorded the same treatment in Bahrain and Kuwait as in Muscat.Also included is a copy of the agreement between the Sultan of Muscat and Oman [Saiyid Taimur bin Faisal], and the D'Arcy Exploration Company Limited on an oil concession for Muscat (ff 268-279).
